failJob(uint256,string).notice: Mark a job as failed and prevent rescheduling

getAssignedNode(uint256).notice: Returns the node assigned to a job

getJobDetails(uint256).notice: Returns the details of a job

getJobStatus(uint256).notice: Returns the status of a job

getJobsBySubmitter(address).notice: Returns a list of job IDs submitted by a given address

getJobsDetailsByNode(uint256).notice: Returns a list of job IDs for a given node, and their corresponding arguments in json format

getNodeInactivityEpochs(uint256).notice: Returns the number of epochs a node has been inactive (did not reveal)

getUnconfirmedJobs(uint256).notice: Returns a list of unconfirmed jobs for a given epoch

processPayment(uint256).notice: Process payment for a completed job

setTokenCountForJob(uint256,uint256).notice: Set the number of tokens required for a job

wasAssignmentRoundStarted(uint256).notice: Checks if an assignment round was started for a given epoch
